title: HERS Diagnostic Output
description: A schema for detailed diagnostic outputs from RESNET Accredited HERS software tools.

project_name.description: Name of the file or project used to generate this data

home_description.description: Supplementary descriptive information about the home

software_name.description: Name of the software used to generate this data

software_version.description: Version of the software used to generate this data

weather_data_location.description: Descriptive name of the weather data location
weather_data_location.notes: For example: City, town, or airport name.

hers_index.notes: Unrounded value based on the latest version of MINHERS

space_heating_system_output.description: Array of outputs for space heating systems

reul_heat.description: Reference home space heating end use loads

ec_r_heat.description: Reference home space heating energy consumption

ec_x_heat.description: Rated home space heating energy consumption

eec_r_heat.description: Reference home space heating equipment efficiency coefficient

eec_x_heat.description: Rated home space heating equipment efficiency coefficient

fuel_type_heat.description: Fuel type used for space heating
notes: Such as natural gas, liquid propane gas, fuel oil

space_cooling_system_output.description: Array of outputs for space cooling systems

reul_cool.description: Reference home space cooling end use loads

ec_r_cool.description: Reference home space cooling energy consumption

ec_x_cool.description: Rated home space cooling energy consumption

eec_r_cool.description: Reference home space cooling equipment efficiency coefficient

eec_x_cool.description: Rated home space cooling equipment efficiency coefficient

water_heating_system_output.description: Array of outputs for water heating systems

reul_hw.description: Reference home water heating end use loads

ec_r_hw.description: Reference home water heating energy consumption

ec_x_hw.description: Rated home water heating energy consumption

eec_r_hw.description: Reference home water heating equipment efficiency coefficient

eec_x_hw.description: Rated home water heating equipment efficiency coefficient

fuel_type_hw.description: Fuel type used for water heating
notes: Such as natural gas, liquid propane gas, fuel oil

rec_la.description: Reference home lighting and appliance energy consumption

ec_la.description: Rated home lighting and appliance energy consumption
